title: Name Parsing
description: Create personalized messages and identify the gender makeup of your database with Name Parsing solutions that will parse full names and multiple names into five components: Prefix; First; Middle or Initial; Last; and Suffix. These Name Parsing solutions recognize more than 190,000 first and last names so you can correct a misspelled name like “Jonh” to “John” or apply a gender code to each record in your database. The solution is available as a programming API, hosted solution or via batch processing.
